loadImage

Load an image file.

Syntax

im = loadImage()
im = loadImage(filename)

Description

loadImage loads an external image file using imread and returns a two-dimensional image matrix scaled between 0 and 1. If a colour image is loaded, the colour channels are summed before scaling. If no input is given for filename, a selection dialog is invoked.

Optional Inputs

filename filename (and pathname if not in the same directory) of the image to load

Outputs

im scaled image matrix

Examples

  • Loading External Image Maps
  • 2D Time Reversal For A Circular Sensor
  • Optimising k-Wave Performance

See Also

imread, resize
